mapper.select:
select * from recruit
and recruit.coach_type like concat('%',recruit.coach_type,'%')
and recruit.coach_style like concat('%',recruit.coach_style,'%')
and recruit.salaryUp >= salary_up and recruit.salaryDown <= salary_down

update coach
